revised_title: Nikolai Nikolaevich Semenov: A Pioneering Chemist and His Impact on Science
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and work of Nikolai Nikolaevich Semenov, a pioneering chemist and Nobel Prize laureate. Semenov made significant contributions to the understanding of chemical kinetics and chain reactions, and his work had a lasting impact on the field of chemistry. The memoir also highlights his collaborations with other scientists and his personal life.
